original_text: And when the ass saw the angel of the Lord, she thrust herself unto the wall, and crushed Balaam's foot against the wall: and he smote her again.
korean_text: 나귀가 여호와의 사자를 보고 몸을 담에 대고 발람의 발을 그 담에 짓누르매 발람이 다시 채찍질하니

sentences.original_text: And when the ass saw the angel of the Lord,
she thrust herself unto the wall,
and crushed Balaam's foot against the wall:
